price: sweeping people away[8], as if they were trunks of uprooted palm trees.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
footnotes: [8] i.e., extracting them from the earth.
